stages.title: NEBULA
stages.description: A giant cloud of dust and gas in space

stages.title: PROTOSTAR
stages.description: Gravity pulls dust and gas together, heating it and forming a protostar

stages.title: LOW MASS MAIN SEQUENCE
stages.description: Hydrogen fuses and turns into helium in the core (this is the current stage of our sun)

stages.title: RED GIANT
stages.description: Cooler on the surface, reddish. hydrogen is a “shell” around core

stages.title: PLANETARY NEBULA
stages.description: Glowing gas cloud around the newly dead core.

stages.title: WHITE DWARF
stages.description: A hot dense stellar core that slowly cools over time

stages.title: BLACK DWARF
stages.description: A cooled white dwarf, emits almost no radiation

stages.title: HIGH MASS MAIN SEQUENCE
stages.description: Formed from the gravitational collapse of protostars, burns fule faster than low mass stars.

stages.title: SUPERGIANT
stages.description: The star expands as it fuses heavier elements in its core.

stages.title: SUPERNOVA
stages.description: The core collapses, causing a catastrophic stellar explosion.

stages.title: NEUTRON STAR
stages.description: If the core is small, then it turns into a radioactive body.

stages.title: BLACK HOLE
stages.description: Only formed if the core is super massive, time and space warps around it
